   Jim Sensenbrenner
   stated on December 8, 2011 in a House Judiciary Committee hearing:

     * Jim Sensenbrenner
   Tom Kertscher
   By Tom Kertscher December 19, 2011

GOP Wisconsin Rep. Jim Sensenbrenner says he's done most impeachments in U.S.
history

   U.S. Rep. Jim Sensenbrenner, R-Wis., was so incensed at U.S. Attorney
   General Eric Holder during a Dec. 8, 2011 congressional hearing he
   threatened to invoke the political death penalty.

But so was another comment Sensenbrenner made in
   issuing his threat when he declared:

   "I've done more impeachments than anybody else in the history of the
   country."

Sensenbrenner argues he has done more impeachments than anyone
   based on his role as a manager in four of the 19 impeachment trials that
   have been conducted since 1799.
